column1: Mead Valley is a census-designated place in Riverside County
column2: California. Mead Valley sits at an elevation of 1
column3: 663 feet (507 m). The 2010 United States census reported Mead Valley's population was 18

column1: Mead Valley is located in a valley of the same name in the northeastern Temescal Mountains
column2: south of the city of Riverside and west of the city of Perris. It is drained by the north fork of Cajalco Creek.
